info.name: kmarchenko_tests
info.description:
This collection has many tests covering the requirements.

Verification:

- **CRUD operations.** Tests by checking that the response's body is the same as aspected. Also Some tests are work in combination: after CREATE try to CREATE the same objsect again. If response has 409 code, then first CREATE added to the db correctly.
    
- **Error handling.** All the test checks that the code is the same as required. This also checks that the function have the same behaviour as aspected.
    
- **Persistence.** Some tests (GET) can be run afyer reconnection to server to check that the data stayed the same.
